overview:
Marty Caron is no longer President of MediMedia Information Technologies, LLC (MMIT). He was terminated as of 4/9/12.

With 25 years of achievement in sales and marketing in the healthcare industry, Marty is responsible for the successful growth of the MMIT division’s business into one of the most profitable franchises within the MediMedia portfolio.

His healthcare career began at IMS Healthcare where he developed a sales and service model to support the use of IMS’ data and services in the domestic market research arena. Since joining MediMedia in 1998, Marty has had a thriving career in both the Veterinary Learning Systems division as well as MMIT.
